body: So, I have been banned for fly hacking, I made a Ban Appeal, but They rejected it, Is there any way I could Pay to get unbanned? I really liked the community, and the server its self, so I wan't to be able to play again, but the only way I see is by paying money, And I will do that if that is what it takes, I just want to know how much?
body_tagged: So, I have been banned for fly hacking, I made a Ban Appeal, but They rejected it, Is there any way I could Pay to get unbanned? I really liked the community, and the server its self, so I wan't to be able to play again, but the only way I see is by paying money, And I will do that if that is what it takes, I just want to know how much?
title: Could I Pay To Get Unbanned?

replies.body: Buy me a touhou figure and Ill swindle an unban
replies.body_tagged: Buy me a touhou figure and Ill swindle an unban

replies.body: You can't pay to be unbanned, unfortunately. You can get evidence to prove you were hacking or wait around 5 months to be appealed. :)
replies.body_tagged: You can't pay to be unbanned, unfortunately. You can get evidence to prove you were hacking or wait around 5 months to be appealed. :)

replies.body: The community has suggested this for like 4 times, nothing has happend. Sr + staff, add this please.

replies.body: Why should people with more money have more chances to play on the server than people with a minor purchasing power?
